column.name: bio
column.value: English writer, poet, philologist, and academic, best known as the author of the high fantasy works The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

column.name: bio
column.value: American novelist best known for her 1960 novel To Kill a Mockingbird.

column.name: bio
column.value: English novelist, essayist, journalist and critic, best known for his novels Animal Farm and Nineteen Eighty-Four.

column.name: bio
column.value: American novelist, essayist, screenwriter, and short-story writer, best known for his novels depicting the flamboyance and excess of the Jazz Age.
